(Incase nobody got it the first time)

::Vukodlak::

    He slumbered a dee=
p slumber, and in it he relived all his past mistakes over and over. This i=
s what he dreamed:
    
    The Autobots had been making a mosterous creatu=
re to battle the Decpticons. They had built him smaller so he would be easy=
 to control. He was quite ugly, and they had decided to bring him on the Ar=
k to finish. They put him in a Stasis Pod of the day and left. Then the Dec=
pticons attacked. 
    The monster had awoken. He left the safty of the Sta=
sis Pod and learned of the Decpticons. He had drained one of it's mech flui=
d and learned much about their life, and the Vivodes. He now considered him=
self one of these creatures, a Voivode Decpticon.
    He knew the Ark was g=
oing to crash, and he programmed his pod to exit and find a safe spot to la=
nd, he planned on becoming a major player in the upcoming war. It never hap=
pened. His Pod landed saftly. But it was swallowed by the Earth. He lay dor=
mant for centuries, and had learned of all that had happened. He had a conn=
ection to the Autobots, and thus could see the Great War. Then came the Bea=
st Wars, and with it, Trantulas. He somehow had a connection to this one as=
 well, but not from the Autobot part of him, it was from the Voivode part. =
He watched the Beast Wars until the moment Trantulas died. He knew that the=
 time of his awakening was coming close at hand. All he needed were pawns t=
o bring him about.
    He had gone insane while waiting and he now thought =
the Autobots would awaken and destroy all. He now thought that he had to de=
stroy them, for his sake, and all Transformers.

    And now he had them, B=
attera and Cerberus. They would bring about the destruction of all Transfor=
mers decended from Autobot, his makers. Voivode Vukodlak would arise and br=
ing forth carnage and destruction that all the worlds to hear. Soon the Voi=
vodes would inherit Cybertron, and all of it's protecotrates, including Ear=
th.

    Soon Vukodlak would awaken....
